h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Gall Gem Location
content: When on the ramp leading downwards, simply follow the monkey into the cave on the right to get the Soak. This is undoubtedly one of the easiest ones to find in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gall_Gem.md', within the main section titled 'Gall Gem', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Gall Gem Location'.
The content is as follows:
When on the ramp leading downwards, simply follow the monkey into the cave on the right to get the Soak. This is undoubtedly one of the easiest ones to find in the game.
